00024 #pragma once
00025 
00037 enum
00038 {
00039   L4_VM_VMX_VMCS_CR2              = 0x6830,
00040 };
00041 
00049 L4_INLINE
00050 unsigned
00051 l4_vm_vmx_field_len(unsigned field);
00052 
00062 L4_INLINE
00063 void *
00064 l4_vm_vmx_field_ptr(void *vmcs, unsigned field);
00065 
00066 
00067 /* Implementations */
00068 
00069 L4_INLINE
00070 unsigned
00071 l4_vm_vmx_field_len(unsigned field)
00072 {
00073   static const char widths[4] = { 2, 8, 4, sizeof(l4_umword_t) };
00074   return widths[field >> 13];
00075 }
00076 
00077 L4_INLINE
00078 void *
00079 l4_vm_vmx_field_ptr(void *vmcs, unsigned field)
00080 {
00081   return (void *)((char *)vmcs
00082                           + ((field >> 13) * 4 + ((field >> 10) & 3) + 1) * 0x80
00083                           + l4_vm_vmx_field_len(field) * ((field >> 1) & 0xff));
00084 }
L4Re - L4 Runtime Environment
